member.name: P:VL.ImGui.Widgets.SkiaWidget.EventFilter
member.summary: Controls in which state events are allowed to pass through.

member.name: F:VL.ImGui.Widgets.EventFilter.ItemHasFocus
member.summary: Events will only pass through if the drawing area has focus.

member.name: F:VL.ImGui.Widgets.EventFilter.WindowHasFocus
member.summary: Events will only pass through if the surrounding ImGui window has focus.
